messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Back in the saddle again!!
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome back!!!  I can t say it s been *quiet* while you were gone, but nobody has a voice like yours. I m glad you re back! Love, Marji ... Marji
messages.messageBody:
Welcome back!!! I can't say it's been *quiet* while you were gone, but
nobody has a voice like yours.

I'm glad you're back!

Love,

Marji


At 01:54 5/29/03 -0400, you wrote:
>I finally got a new computer...old one was just a two-bit horse that we had
>to put out of it's misery!!
>So I'm BACK!! Thank goodness. Life without internet access is very weird when
>you use it frequently.
>
>I've missed y'all and had to delete many, many digests in order to be sane.
>So I've missed lots of good (and maybe some not so good) discussions I'm
>sure.
>
>Ren

messages.subject: Back in the saddle again!!
messages.msgSnippet: I finally got a new computer...old one was just a two-bit horse that we had to put out of it s misery!! So I m BACK!! Thank goodness. Life without internet
messages.messageBody:
I finally got a new computer...old one was just a two-bit horse that we had
to put out of it's misery!!
So I'm BACK!! Thank goodness. Life without internet access is very weird when
you use it frequently.

I've missed y'all and had to delete many, many digests in order to be sane.
So I've missed lots of good (and maybe some not so good) discussions I'm
sure.

Ren
